alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Camden, Glynn, east central Brantley and southeastern Wayne Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Everett, or 10 miles northwest of Dock Junction, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Waverly, Thalmann, Sea Island, Everett, Jekyll Island and Boys Estate. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Wayne
